item.description:
Join us for fun and socializing at The Roger Williams Park Zoo in Providence, Rhode Island on Saturday, May 28.

This event is rain or shine!

 

Hello All,

As promised, here is one of several "family friendly" events. Lots of we Ayn Rand Meetup members have kids, some young and some all-growed up.

It's a chance to socialize outside of our more formal salon/meetup format.

My son, August (7 years old), and I are organizing this event -- and hope many of you will join us.

Also: if you are a Firefox (web browser) fan, you may be lucky enough to see the real firefoxes at the zoo. When I last visited, they had at least two Red Pandas, a.k.a. a firefox.

We'll be meeting at 11:30AM outside the Zoo entrance (see building A on the PDF map available at the RWPZ website).

We'll then have about 4 hours to mosey around.

Please contact me directly -- or send me email via meetup if you have questions, need a ride, etc.

See you there!

Excitedly,

Mark

 

MORE ZOO INFO:

Home Page of the Roger Williams Park Zoo

RWPZ Visitor Info Page (Hours, Directions, Admission Rates, Map of the Zoo, Etc.)
item.how_to_find_us: look for Mark Shar (wearing his Aussie hat) outside the Zoo Entrance

group.name: The Boston Ayn Rand Meetup Group

item.name: Roger Williams Park Zoo Visit, Family Friendly Event
